resources.string: Please enter ICAO codes then press validate

A) - aerodrome location indicator
 B) - observation date and time
 C) - runway designator
 D) - cleared runway length
 E) - cleared runway width
 F) - deposits over total runway length
 G) - mean depth deposit for each third of total runway length
 H) - friction measurements and friction measurement device
 J) - critical snowbanks
 K) - runway lights
 L) - further clearance
 M) - further clearance expected to be completed (UTC)
 N) - taxiway
 P) - taxiway snowbanks
 R) - apron
 S) - next planned observation/measurement
 T) - plain-language remarks

SWEN0565 ENGM 12040725 
(SNOWTAM 0565
A) ENGM
B) 12040725 C) 01L
F) 2/5/5 G) XX/6/6 H) 5/4/4
B) 12040724 C) 01R
F) 5/5/5 G) 6/6/6 H) 4/4/4
N) C C1 C2 C3 C4 U U1 U2 U3/67 ALL REMAINING TWYS/5
R) APRON B SOUTH/CLSD APRON GA 311/319
APRON GA 320/329 APRON GA 330/338 APRON GA NORTH
APRON MIL 1/3 APRON MIL 4/10 APRON NEW HANGAR
APRON NORWEGIAN APRON SAS/67 APRON B NORTH
APRON WF/6 ALL REMAINING APRONS/5
T) RWY 01L
CONTAMINATION/100/100/100/PERCENT.
SLIPPERY PORTIONS ON CENTRAL APRON. FRICTION 3 ON
TAXIWAYS.
RWY 01R
OBSERVATION TIME RWY 01R 202012040724
CONTAMINATION/100/100/100/PERCENT.

PORTIONS ON GA APRONS. FRICTION 3 ON TAXIWAYS.)
